title: How to Get Tickets to Harry Styles’ Sold-Out Tour
summary: The 50-show Together, Together tour — supporting his fourth studio album 'Kiss All the Time. Disco, Occasionally.' — includes a 30-night residency at New York City's Madison Square Garden.

title: Bad Bunny Tops Grammys Fashion Power Rankings
summary: The superstar accepted three trophies, including album of the year, in a velvet Schiaparelli tuxedo that also set social media ablaze, while Sabrina Carpenter captured high-wattage attention in Valentino.
